hero.title: Atlas Al-Sharq International Exhibitions & Conferences
hero.subtitle: Your Gateway to Success in Global Markets

about.title: Atlas Al-Sharq Company for Exhibitions and Conferences
about.subtitle: A success journey spanning over 15 years in connecting businesses between China and Saudi Arabia
about.description: We are proud of 15 years of experience in the field of exhibitions and international trade, offering innovative solutions to connect Saudi companies with Chinese and global markets

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the first strategic partner in connecting businesses between China and Saudi Arabia, achieving sustainable growth for companies in both countries

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Providing professional platforms and integrated solutions that enable companies to access new markets and build successful strategic partnerships

company.title: About the Company
company.description: Atlas Al-Sharq for Exhibitions and Conferences is a leading company specialized in organizing international exhibitions and conferences, founded in 2009 with the aim of connecting businesses between China and Saudi Arabia. We provide comprehensive services including exhibition organization, business trip arrangements, and facilitating commercial communication between companies in both countries.

features.experienceDesc: More than 15 years of experience in organizing international exhibitions and conferences
features.networkDesc: Strong relationships with over 2000 Chinese partners and 500 Saudi companies
features.qualityDesc: Global quality standards in all our services with full satisfaction guarantee
features.supportDesc: Continuous technical and administrative support before, during and after events

testimonial1.name: Ahmed Al-Abdullah
testimonial1.text: Atlas Al-Sharq completely transformed our business trajectory. Through their exceptional exhibitions, we were able to reach over 500 new Chinese partners and increase our sales by 300%.

testimonial2.name: Fatima Al-Zahrani
testimonial2.text: The exceptional service and high professionalism enabled us to achieve strategic partnerships with the largest Chinese companies. The Atlas Al-Sharq team is professional and dedicated.

testimonial3.name: Mohammed Al-Shehri
testimonial3.text: Thanks to Atlas Al-Sharq, we were able to enter the Chinese market with remarkable success. Their deep expertise and extensive network of relationships were the key to our success.

hero.title: Exhibitions & International Events
hero.subtitle: Discover the most important international exhibitions and events that bring together Saudi and Chinese companies
hero.description: Discover the most important international exhibitions and events that bring together Saudi and Chinese companies

falconExhibition.title: Saudi International Falcon and Hunting Exhibition 2025
falconExhibition.subtitle: The Largest Falcon and Hunting Exhibition in the Middle East
falconExhibition.description: The International Falcon Exhibition is an annual event that brings together falconry enthusiasts from around the world. It showcases the finest falcon breeds and the latest equipment and techniques used in falconry, with competitions and auctions for rare falcons.

blackhatExhibition.title: Black Hat Middle East & Africa 2025
blackhatExhibition.subtitle: The Largest Cybersecurity Conference in the Region
blackhatExhibition.description: A leading cybersecurity conference and exhibition held in Riyadh, bringing together top cybersecurity experts, modern technologies, solution providers, and decision-makers from around the world.
blackhatExhibition.location: Riyadh - Riyadh International Convention & Exhibition Center

leapExhibition.title: LEAP Global Technology Conference 2025
leapExhibition.subtitle: The Largest Technology Exhibition in the Region
leapExhibition.description: A global technology event held in Riyadh, aimed at showcasing the latest innovations and technologies in artificial intelligence, Internet of Things, fintech, and health tech.
leapExhibition.location: Riyadh - Riyadh International Convention & Exhibition Center
